description:
MCGIF
A universal Minecraft animation generator — a visual language every MC player understands.
Connect through images and share fun skin animations.
——————

mcgif.cn | v1.1
Added animations like hip shaking and waving
------------------
mcgif.cn | v1.2
Custom backgrounds and character scaling
------------------
mcgif.cn | v2.0
MCGIF (More than just GIFs!)
Enter an ID and take a snapshot with famous landmarks
------------------
mcgif.cn | v2.1
Too lonely alone? Enter multiple IDs to generate group images
------------------
mcgif.cn | v2.2
Poses? Never taught in class.
Now you can freely adjust limbs to create more interesting and beautiful images
------------------
The above features are conceptual and not fully implemented yet.
Developers who love Minecraft are welcome to join and help bring these ideas to life.
——————
mcgif.cn
title: MCGIF.CN | Animate Your Minecraft Skin
